ygData.subject: Re: Song 43
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, if we get anymore songs that require mana i am thinking Meditation will be needed (like all other hybrids) Rinwin ...
ygData.messageBody:
Well, if we get anymore songs that require mana i'am thinking Meditation
will be needed (like all other hybrids)

Rinwin

>i don't see why you couldn't. looks like we will not get it until the next
>patch though, it is still not in freeport or qeynos where it is supposed to
>be.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard (and anxious to try the song!), Mithaniel
>Marr
>
>

> > Once I sing my mana-using song, can I then go to my songbook
> > and forget this
> > song and memorize another one? And then once my mana
> > regenerates on it's
> > own over the next 30-60 minutes, rememorize the song to be
> > able to use it
> > again? This seems to be the best way to take advantage of this song.
> >
